contentrichtext.text: '''Baron Jones''' could refer to one of the following ('''Baroness Jones''' for a peeress) *[[Barry Jones, Baron Jones]] *[[Baron Jones of Naven]] (a subsidiary title held by [[Viscount Ranelagh]]) *[[Nigel Jones, Baron Jones of Cheltenham]] *[[Digby Jones, Baron Jones of Birmingham]] *[[Maggie Jones, Baroness Jones of Whitchurch]] The following either use a title which does not include Jones or have double-barreled names *[[Leifchild Jones, 1st Baron Rhayader]] *[[Thomas Jones, Baron Maelor]] *[[Alun Jones, Baron Chalfont]] *[[Elwyn Jones, Baron Elwyn-Jones]] *[[Timothy Clement-Jones, Baron Clement-Jones]] *[[William Wynne-Jones, Baron Wynne-Jones]] *[[Tristan Garel-Jones, Baron Garel-Jones]] *[[Pauline Neville-Jones, Baroness Neville-Jones]] *[[Antony Armstrong-Jones, 1st Earl of Snowdon]], Baron Armstrong-Jones *[[Samuel Jones-Loyd, 1st Baron Overstone]] ==See also== *[[Jones (disambiguation)]] *[[Jones (surname)]] {{disambig}}
